Extra.en: Rage makes sure every third attack doubles the attack power of the unit,  up to a maximum cap of quadruple (4x) damage. Fire Dragon's attack pattern is as follows: 1x-1x-2x-2x-4x. After that,  quadruple damage is dealt every attack until it leaves combat for 10s.
